w:r.w:t: A visual markdown editor that bridges the gap between technical documentation and collaborative writing.
- TipTap-based visual editing with real-time preview
- Clean markdown output for GitHub and AI tools
- Visual table editing with row/column operations
- Touch-optimized interface for tablets and phones
- Audit logs, data encryption, compliance reports
[ ] Implement virtual scrolling for large documents
[x] Unit tests with Jest + React Testing Library
Submit pull request with clear description
